name: Memory Lane (itch) (MAGES Institute of Excellence)
description:
You're a kid who is in a town, and you remember the old village that you grew up in. Your parents would always share memories of that village but never tell you why they left. You leave the town in search of the village and asked people you meet on your way but they don’t know or remember any sort of village that you are describing, as you go further you start to have bad memories. You reach the end and you see an empty village that shows signs of neglect and overgrown with nature.

MAGES Institute of Excellence

Memory Lane was developed over a 6 week period by DGDT Arvin Raviyellan as part of the Algorithms, Mathematics and Physics Module.
